attributes.action: refuse to pay the £1.7 billion that the EU are demanding and get Great Britain out of the european union
attributes.additional_details: I think it's a joke that Great Britain are being punished for having a growing economy by the EU demanding an extra £1.7 billion on top of the £8.1 billion we already pay therefore we should leave the EU, we have too much immigration, we have lost the ability to control out own decisions and we traded with the whole world long before being part of the EU no problem!
